newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - May 7.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- London Club of banks signs agreement with Ivory Coast allowing for a 90 percent reduction of commercial debt.
- Education Minister Pierre Kipre says university exams will be held despite trouble at several campusses.

- Ivorian company Eoule and Canada's Optec Energie Services are together investing 1.5 billion CFA to trap gas generated from the decomposition of rubbish at Abidjan's Akouedo dump. The operation expects annual profits of 400 million CFA starting in October 1997.
- Insecurity may be a handicap to the emergence of a tourist industry which is internationally competitive.
